    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createClientQuery(Client client)
      method which initialiezes a query of a client class and gets all og the parameters from the object moreover call the method to showing the result of the query
      void createOrderQuery(Ordercl order)
      method which initialiezes a query of a ordercl class and gets all og the parameters from the object moreover call the method to showing the result of the query
      void deleteClient()
      method, whichh asks for parameters, builds a client and delete it from a database if the client does not exist in a database it informs the user about it and try to get another id number from a user
      void deleteOrder()
      method, whichh asks for parameters, builds an order and delete it from a database if the order does not exist in a database it informs the user about it and try to get another id number from a user
      void mainLoop()
      main loop, which calls displaying all functionalities, allows user to choose which functionality he wants to use and allows the program to work continously
      void passClient()
      method, which asks for a parameters, buids a client and updates it in a database if the client does not exist in a database it informs the user about it and try to get another id number from a user
      void passOrder()
      method, which asks for a parameters, buids a order and updates it in a database if the client does not exist in a database it informs the user about it and try to get another id number from a user
      java.util.List<Client> showAll()
      method which gets and returns a list of clients
      java.util.List<Ordercl> showAllO()
      method which gets and returns a list of orders
